Translations.Text: Visvasigale, nivu allahana sahayakaragiri – maryamara putra isa tam'ma apta sisyarodane ‘‘allahana margadalli nanage neravaguvavaru yariddare?’’ Endante. Avara apta sisyaru ‘‘navu allahana sahayakaru’’ endaru. A balika isra'ilara santatiyallina ondu gumpu visvasavittitu mattu innondu gumpu dhikkarisitu. Navu visvasigalige avara satrugala virudda neravu odagisidevu mattu avaru vijayigaladaru
akasagalalli mattu bhumiyalliruva ellavu allahana pavitravannu japisuttive. Avanu naija adhipatiyu parama pavananu prabalanu yuktivantanu agiddane

avane niraksarigala madhye, avarallobbanannu dutanagi kaluhisidanu. Avaru (a dutaru) avarige atana vacanagalannu odi kelisuttare. Hagu avarannu sanskarisuttare mattu avarige granthavannu yuktiyannu kalisikoduttare. I hinde a janaru spastavagi darigettiddaru
idallade, avara paiki, avarinnu bhetiyagilladavara kadegu avarannu (dutaragi) kaluhisalagide. Avanu prabalanu yuktivantanu agiruttane
idu allahana anugraha. Avanu tanicchisidavarige idannu dayapalisuttane mattu allahanu maha anugrahasaliyagiddane

tauratina hone vahisi kodaladavaru mattu a honeyannu nirvahisade iddavara udaharaneyu granthagala hore hotta katteyantide. Allahana vacanagalannu tiraskarisidavara sthitiyu nijakku kettadagide. Allahanu akramigalige saridariyannu toruvudilla
heliri; ‘‘yahudigale, itarella manavarannu bittu, nivu matra allahanige parama aptaru emba doddastike nimagiddare mattu nivu satyavantaragiddare, nivu maranavannu apeksisiri’’
avaru adannendu apeksisalararu. (Ekendare) avara kaigalu munde kalisiruva karmagalu hagive. Allahanu akramigalannu cennagi ballanu
